Also i check info, that my tensorflow use GPU dedicated memory and it's ok, but not use GPU processor, and use CPU processor, is it normal?

body:
I think Gchrome not use GPU memory, because when i closed GChrome, and start use Firefox for Jupiter, everything was ok.
Also i check info, that my tensorflow use GPU dedicated memory and it's ok, but not use GPU processor, and use CPU processor, is it normal?
